title: Deadly Accident Spurs Safer Rail Transport For Crude Oil
teaser: It's been one year since an oil train derailment outside Casselton, North Dakota â€” a crash that sent a huge fireball into the sky, forcing the evacuation of a community. Since then, state and federal regulators have taken steps to make it safer to transport crude by rail.
